You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

list_of_reviews.review_title: beware of email spams from huobi
list_of_reviews.review: beware of email spams from huobi, my email is always clean from spams like for 10 years, after joining huobi, my inbox are filled with random spams like AIRDROP NFTs all the while. in that case, they also spams newsletter without the unsubscribe option, for example email domain from pro.huobi.vn etc. in the other words, they sells your information. take it serious just incase if you dont like your personal detail being exposed.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Third class useless P2P service
list_of_reviews.review: Third class useless P2P service. They provide full support to the scammers. They should get class from Binance support team. Worst P2P support in my experience. My coins are locked by a scammer from last 2 months and scammer confirmed in the order chat that he has provided fake receipt, still the support asking to the scammer if he can cancel the order or not. Useless support. Stay away from such rubbish platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Huobi made me pay for his own mistake!
list_of_reviews.review: I had to go to huobi because of binance leaving the country i live in. Before I startedi checked the crypto currencies tradedon the exchange and saw that they were trading the ones i have had and deposited the currency, in this case Super RARE in a quite expensive way too. But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange holds your data at ransom. You can only view your historic trading data for 4 months only. If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review: Waited hours on the final L4 verification. Have tried every way to submit the document but it just keeps failing saying one thing or the other. I mean, they need bank statements in jpeg/png format for address verification. After supplying that too, it simply fails. When I ask the customer care, I get a bot like reply, "Please provide in suitable format" . Pathetic

list_of_reviews.review_title: beware of email spams from huobi
list_of_reviews.review: beware of email spams from huobi, my email is always clean from spams like for 10 years, after joining huobi, my inbox are filled with random spams like AIRDROP NFTs all the while. in that case, they also spams newsletter without the unsubscribe option, for example email domain from pro.huobi.vn etc. in the other words, they sells your information. take it serious just incase if you dont like your personal detail being exposed.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Third class useless P2P service
list_of_reviews.review: Third class useless P2P service. They provide full support to the scammers. They should get class from Binance support team. Worst P2P support in my experience. My coins are locked by a scammer from last 2 months and scammer confirmed in the order chat that he has provided fake receipt, still the support asking to the scammer if he can cancel the order or not. Useless support. Stay away from such rubbish platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Huobi made me pay for his own mistake!
list_of_reviews.review: I had to go to huobi because of binance leaving the country i live in. Before I startedi checked the crypto currencies tradedon the exchange and saw that they were trading the ones i have had and deposited the currency, in this case Super RARE in a quite expensive way too. But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange holds your data at ransom. You can only view your historic trading data for 4 months only. If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

list_of_reviews.review_title: URGENT - BEWARE, BEWARE - HUOBI FREEZES YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS, EVEN THE ACCOUNT IS VERIFIED AND WITHIN LIMITS
list_of_reviews.review: MY ACCOUNT WAS VERIFIED AND WITHIN THE MONTHLY AND WEEKLY LIMITS,I MADE 3 RECEIPTS OF 500 DOLLARS IN USDT EACH AND OK, I WAS ABLE TO WITHDRAW.WHEN I DECIDED TO RECEIVE 1500 DOLLARS, SHE BLOCKED MY FUNDS FOR WITHDRAWAL, AND REQUIRED PROOF OF ALL ORIGIN OF MY CRYPTO ASSETS.I'VE NEVER SEEN AN EXCHANGE DO THAT WITH CRYPTO ASSETS, NEVER, IT FROZEN ME FOR 15 MONTHS, EVERY TIME I SENT DOCUMENTS, IT ASKS ME FOR NEW DOCUMENTS.I RECOMMEND EVERYONE NEVER, EVER USE HUOBI, SEARCH ON GOOGLE ABOUT HUOBI REVIEWS,  SHE FREEZES AND LOCKS YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS TO PROFIT MORE.CAUTION, CAUTION, DO NOT USE HUOBI OR KUCOIN, EVER, EVER, EVER

list_of_reviews.review_title: Scam
list_of_reviews.review: Scam, they created an etf with name eth*3, i bought it and suddenly they delisted it with all the money gone, you can't delist a self made coin that doesn't exist on any other exchange and you cant transfer it anywhere else, all the people money were lost... bunch of scammers

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Extract key phrases and words that frequently appear in the reviews, which might indicate common areas of concern or praise for www.huobi.com. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Common key phrases and words include "stablecoins," "seamless payment experiences," "Bitcoin halving," "investor optimism," and "user-friendly, interconnected solutions." These indicate praise for market trends and investor behavior, focusing on ease of use and positive industry events without manipulation concerns.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Calculate the average rating from the reviews and analyze the distribution of ratings to understand the general user satisfaction level. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The average rating is 3, calculated from ratings of 5, 5, 1, and 1. The distribution shows two highly positive and two highly negative reviews, indicating polarized user satisfaction.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Generate concise review summary to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Reviews are polarized with an average rating of 3. Users praise ease of use and reliability but criticize connectivity issues and poor user experience, leading some to consider alternatives. Concerns about trust and operational integrity are also noted.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews emphasize seamless payments, intuitive design, and regulatory compliance, while negative reviews focus on platform connectivity issues, lack of interoperability, and poor user experience. Key differentiators are ease of use and seamless integration versus technical and usability challenges.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the www.huobi.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Huobi's customer support is described as "expeditious" and capable of resolving issues with patience despite a language barrier, indicating effective but occasionally challenging interactions.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews reveal a polarized user satisfaction with the platform, characterized by both high praise and significant criticism. Positive feedback highlights the seamless payment experiences, intuitive design, and adherence to regulatory compliance, which are key strengths of the platform. However, critical issues include platform connectivity problems, lack of interoperability, and poor user experience, which detract from overall user satisfaction. Concerns about trust and operational integrity, as indicated by phrases like "cheating customer," suggest deeper issues with customer treatment and business practices. To improve, the platform should focus on enhancing technical reliability, ensuring better interoperability, and addressing customer service and trust concerns to foster a more consistently positive user experience.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Third class useless P2P service

list_of_reviews.review_title: Huobi made me pay for his own mistake!
list_of_reviews.review: I had to go to huobi because of binance leaving the country i live in. Before I startedi checked the crypto currencies tradedon the exchange and saw that they were trading the ones i have had and deposited the currency, in this case Super RARE in a quite expensive way too. But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange holds your data at ransom. You can only view your historic trading data for 4 months only. If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

list_of_reviews.review: beware of email spams from huobi, my email is always clean from spams like for 10 years, after joining huobi, my inbox are filled with random spams like AIRDROP NFTs all the while. in that case, they also spams newsletter without the unsubscribe option, for example email domain from pro.huobi.vn etc. in the other words, they sells your information. take it serious just incase if you dont like your personal detail being exposed.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Third class useless P2P service
list_of_reviews.review: Third class useless P2P service. They provide full support to the scammers. They should get class from Binance support team. Worst P2P support in my experience. My coins are locked by a scammer from last 2 months and scammer confirmed in the order chat that he has provided fake receipt, still the support asking to the scammer if he can cancel the order or not. Useless support. Stay away from such rubbish platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Huobi made me pay for his own mistake!
list_of_reviews.review: I had to go to huobi because of binance leaving the country i live in. Before I startedi checked the crypto currencies tradedon the exchange and saw that they were trading the ones i have had and deposited the currency, in this case Super RARE in a quite expensive way too. But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange holds your data at ransom. You can only view your historic trading data for 4 months only. If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

list_of_reviews.review_title: Waited hours on the verification

list_of_reviews.review_title: beware of email spams from huobi
list_of_reviews.review: beware of email spams from huobi, my email is always clean from spams like for 10 years, after joining huobi, my inbox are filled with random spams like AIRDROP NFTs all the while. in that case, they also spams newsletter without the unsubscribe option, for example email domain from pro.huobi.vn etc. in the other words, they sells your information. take it serious just incase if you dont like your personal detail being exposed.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Third class useless P2P service
list_of_reviews.review: Third class useless P2P service. They provide full support to the scammers. They should get class from Binance support team. Worst P2P support in my experience. My coins are locked by a scammer from last 2 months and scammer confirmed in the order chat that he has provided fake receipt, still the support asking to the scammer if he can cancel the order or not. Useless support. Stay away from such rubbish platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Huobi made me pay for his own mistake!
list_of_reviews.review: I had to go to huobi because of binance leaving the country i live in. Before I startedi checked the crypto currencies tradedon the exchange and saw that they were trading the ones i have had and deposited the currency, in this case Super RARE in a quite expensive way too. But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange holds your data at ransom. You can only view your historic trading data for 4 months only. If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

list_of_reviews.review_title: Huobi made me pay for his own mistake!
list_of_reviews.review: I had to go to huobi because of binance leaving the country i live in. Before I startedi checked the crypto currencies tradedon the exchange and saw that they were trading the ones i have had and deposited the currency, in this case Super RARE in a quite expensive way too. But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange holds your data at ransom. You can only view your historic trading data for 4 months only. If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. list_of_reviews.review: beware of email spams from huobi, my email is always clean from spams like for 10 years, after joining huobi, my inbox are filled with random spams like AIRDROP NFTs all the while. in that case, they also spams newsletter without the unsubscribe option, for example email domain from pro.huobi.vn etc. in the other words, they sells your information. take it serious just incase if you dont like your personal detail being exposed.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Third class useless P2P service
list_of_reviews.review: Third class useless P2P service. They provide full support to the scammers. They should get class from Binance support team. Worst P2P support in my experience. My coins are locked by a scammer from last 2 months and scammer confirmed in the order chat that he has provided fake receipt, still the support asking to the scammer if he can cancel the order or not. Useless support. Stay away from such rubbish platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Huobi made me pay for his own mistake!
list_of_reviews.review: I had to go to huobi because of binance leaving the country i live in. Before I startedi checked the crypto currencies tradedon the exchange and saw that they were trading the ones i have had and deposited the currency, in this case Super RARE in a quite expensive way too. But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange holds your data at ransom. You can only view your historic trading data for 4 months only. If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

list_of_reviews.review_title: URGENT - BEWARE, BEWARE - HUOBI FREEZES YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS, EVEN THE ACCOUNT IS VERIFIED AND WITHIN LIMITS
list_of_reviews.review: MY ACCOUNT WAS VERIFIED AND WITHIN THE MONTHLY AND WEEKLY LIMITS,I MADE 3 RECEIPTS OF 500 DOLLARS IN USDT EACH AND OK, I WAS ABLE TO WITHDRAW.WHEN I DECIDED TO RECEIVE 1500 DOLLARS, SHE BLOCKED MY FUNDS FOR WITHDRAWAL, AND REQUIRED PROOF OF ALL ORIGIN OF MY CRYPTO ASSETS.I'VE NEVER SEEN AN EXCHANGE DO THAT WITH CRYPTO ASSETS, NEVER, IT FROZEN ME FOR 15 MONTHS, EVERY TIME I SENT DOCUMENTS, IT ASKS ME FOR NEW DOCUMENTS.I RECOMMEND EVERYONE NEVER, EVER USE HUOBI, SEARCH ON GOOGLE ABOUT HUOBI REVIEWS,  SHE FREEZES AND LOCKS YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS TO PROFIT MORE.CAUTION, CAUTION, DO NOT USE HUOBI OR KUCOIN, EVER, EVER, EVER

list_of_reviews.review: Scam, they created an etf with name eth*3, i bought it and suddenly they delisted it with all the money gone, you can't delist a self made coin that doesn't exist on any other exchange and you cant transfer it anywhere else, all the people money were lost... bunch of scammers

list_of_reviews.review_title: Third class useless P2P service

list_of_reviews.review_title: Huobi made me pay for his own mistake!
list_of_reviews.review: I had to go to huobi because of binance leaving the country i live in. Before I startedi checked the crypto currencies tradedon the exchange and saw that they were trading the ones i have had and deposited the currency, in this case Super RARE in a quite expensive way too. But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange holds your data at ransom. You can only view your historic trading data for 4 months only. If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

list_of_reviews.review_title: URGENT - BEWARE, BEWARE - HUOBI FREEZES YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS, EVEN THE ACCOUNT IS VERIFIED AND WITHIN LIMITS
list_of_reviews.review: MY ACCOUNT WAS VERIFIED AND WITHIN THE MONTHLY AND WEEKLY LIMITS,I MADE 3 RECEIPTS OF 500 DOLLARS IN USDT EACH AND OK, I WAS ABLE TO WITHDRAW.WHEN I DECIDED TO RECEIVE 1500 DOLLARS, SHE BLOCKED MY FUNDS FOR WITHDRAWAL, AND REQUIRED PROOF OF ALL ORIGIN OF MY CRYPTO ASSETS.I'VE NEVER SEEN AN EXCHANGE DO THAT WITH CRYPTO ASSETS, NEVER, IT FROZEN ME FOR 15 MONTHS, EVERY TIME I SENT DOCUMENTS, IT ASKS ME FOR NEW DOCUMENTS.I RECOMMEND EVERYONE NEVER, EVER USE HUOBI, SEARCH ON GOOGLE ABOUT HUOBI REVIEWS,  SHE FREEZES AND LOCKS YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS TO PROFIT MORE.CAUTION, CAUTION, DO NOT USE HUOBI OR KUCOIN, EVER, EVER, EVER

list_of_reviews.review_title: Third class useless P2P service

list_of_reviews.review_title: Huobi made me pay for his own mistake!
list_of_reviews.review: I had to go to huobi because of binance leaving the country i live in. Before I startedi checked the crypto currencies tradedon the exchange and saw that they were trading the ones i have had and deposited the currency, in this case Super RARE in a quite expensive way too. But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…

Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: the arbitration system for the p2p…
list_of_reviews.review: the arbitration system for the p2p platform is dead. The buyer did not transfer the money and went missing. The money has not been returned for several days. Stupid support bot does not name the terms. The money is stuck indefinitely. What to do next is unclear. The bot does not explain anything except the endless word "wait".

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wasted my time on verification
list_of_reviews.review: Wasted my time on verification. At the end it refuses with the message "sorry deposite is impossible in your country". I used passport of one country, but am resident in another one. There is no way to correct or update this information, customer support is absent. I do not recommend to use it for european residents.

list_of_reviews.review_title: theft
list_of_reviews.review: theft , they do not allow withdrawal i tried everything they always block the wallet address or the coin selection .THIS IS THE ONLY REASON BTC IS GROWING AS THEY DO NOT ALLOW WITHDRAWAL under disguise of technical issues STAY AWAY FROM THIS CROOKS

list_of_reviews.review_title: Aware at all costs. Scamm exchange.
list_of_reviews.review: Stolen my 600 usdt and banned me for nothing. Today they have closed a Solana usdt address and has not notified me. So, money lost. And now they block me from support, but i even have not sent them anything yet. Aware, this is scam exchange

list_of_reviews.review_title: Make a small deposit just for test a…
list_of_reviews.review: Make a small deposit just for test a wile o go money never arrived ask customer service for reverse transaction after provide a video they ask for more details Make no sense none of the platforms I have been registered ask this kind of question.Reaping people off

list_of_reviews.review_title: Waited hours on the verification
list_of_reviews.review: Waited hours on the final L4 verification. Have tried every way to submit the document but it just keeps failing saying one thing or the other. I mean, they need bank statements in jpeg/png format for address verification. After supplying that too, it simply fails. When I ask the customer care, I get a bot like reply, "Please provide in suitable format" . Pathetic

list_of_reviews.review_title: beware of email spams from huobi
list_of_reviews.review: beware of email spams from huobi, my email is always clean from spams like for 10 years, after joining huobi, my inbox are filled with random spams like AIRDROP NFTs all the while. in that case, they also spams newsletter without the unsubscribe option, for example email domain from pro.huobi.vn etc. in the other words, they sells your information. take it serious just incase if you dont like your personal detail being exposed.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Third class useless P2P service
list_of_reviews.review: Third class useless P2P service. They provide full support to the scammers. They should get class from Binance support team. Worst P2P support in my experience. My coins are locked by a scammer from last 2 months and scammer confirmed in the order chat that he has provided fake receipt, still the support asking to the scammer if he can cancel the order or not. Useless support. Stay away from such rubbish platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Huobi made me pay for his own mistake!
list_of_reviews.review: I had to go to huobi because of binance leaving the country i live in. Before I startedi checked the crypto currencies tradedon the exchange and saw that they were trading the ones i have had and deposited the currency, in this case Super RARE in a quite expensive way too. But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange holds your data at ransom. You can only view your historic trading data for 4 months only. If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

list_of_reviews.review_title: URGENT - BEWARE, BEWARE - HUOBI FREEZES YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS, EVEN THE ACCOUNT IS VERIFIED AND WITHIN LIMITS
list_of_reviews.review: MY ACCOUNT WAS VERIFIED AND WITHIN THE MONTHLY AND WEEKLY LIMITS,I MADE 3 RECEIPTS OF 500 DOLLARS IN USDT EACH AND OK, I WAS ABLE TO WITHDRAW.WHEN I DECIDED TO RECEIVE 1500 DOLLARS, SHE BLOCKED MY FUNDS FOR WITHDRAWAL, AND REQUIRED PROOF OF ALL ORIGIN OF MY CRYPTO ASSETS.I'VE NEVER SEEN AN EXCHANGE DO THAT WITH CRYPTO ASSETS, NEVER, IT FROZEN ME FOR 15 MONTHS, EVERY TIME I SENT DOCUMENTS, IT ASKS ME FOR NEW DOCUMENTS.I RECOMMEND EVERYONE NEVER, EVER USE HUOBI, SEARCH ON GOOGLE ABOUT HUOBI REVIEWS,  SHE FREEZES AND LOCKS YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS TO PROFIT MORE.CAUTION, CAUTION, DO NOT USE HUOBI OR KUCOIN, EVER, EVER, EVER

list_of_reviews.review_title: Scam
list_of_reviews.review: Scam, they created an etf with name eth*3, i bought it and suddenly they delisted it with all the money gone, you can't delist a self made coin that doesn't exist on any other exchange and you cant transfer it anywhere else, all the people money were lost... bunch of scammers

prompts_output.Output:
Key phrases: "security," "robustness," "speed," "customer service," "language barrier," "commissions," "deposit and withdrawal minimums," "support."

Explanation: These phrases highlight common praise for Huobi's security, robustness, and speed, while concerns include customer service, language barriers, and high commissions.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Calculate the average rating from the reviews and analyze the distribution of ratings to understand the general user satisfaction level. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I don't have access to specific review data to calculate the average rating or analyze the distribution of ratings. However, recent reviews from August 2024 rate the service poorly, labeling it as a scam and criticizing its lack of transparency.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Generate concise review summary to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output:
Recent reviews from August 2024 label the service as a scam, criticizing its lack of transparency, manipulated prices, withdrawal issues, and lengthy verification, despite positive mentions of transaction growth and customer support.

Explanation: This summary captures the negative sentiment, timing, and main concerns of users, along with positive aspects, in a concise manner.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews highlight TRON's transaction growth, stablecoin market cap, and customer support. Negative reviews criticize manipulated prices, withdrawal issues, lengthy verification, and blocked funds. Key differentiators are transaction efficiency and support versus trading integrity and transparency.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the www.huobi.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Huobi's customer support is described as expeditious and effective, though occasionally hindered by language barriers. Despite this, issues are resolved with patience, indicating overall responsiveness and effectiveness.

overall_prompt_summary: Recent reviews from August 2024 indicate a significant negative sentiment towards the service, with users labeling it as a scam and criticizing its lack of transparency. Key issues include manipulated prices, withdrawal problems, lengthy verification processes, and blocked funds, which undermine trading integrity and user trust. Despite these criticisms, positive feedback highlights TRON's transaction growth, increased stablecoin market cap, and strong customer support. The main themes revolve around the efficiency of transactions and customer support versus the integrity and transparency of trading practices. To improve, the service should address withdrawal and verification issues, enhance transparency, and ensure fair trading practices to rebuild user trust and satisfaction.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Waited hours on the verification

list_of_reviews.review_title: beware of email spams from huobi
list_of_reviews.review: beware of email spams from huobi, my email is always clean from spams like for 10 years, after joining huobi, my inbox are filled with random spams like AIRDROP NFTs all the while. in that case, they also spams newsletter without the unsubscribe option, for example email domain from pro.huobi.vn etc. in the other words, they sells your information. take it serious just incase if you dont like your personal detail being exposed.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Third class useless P2P service
list_of_reviews.review: Third class useless P2P service. They provide full support to the scammers. They should get class from Binance support team. Worst P2P support in my experience. My coins are locked by a scammer from last 2 months and scammer confirmed in the order chat that he has provided fake receipt, still the support asking to the scammer if he can cancel the order or not. Useless support. Stay away from such rubbish platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Huobi made me pay for his own mistake!
list_of_reviews.review: I had to go to huobi because of binance leaving the country i live in. Before I startedi checked the crypto currencies tradedon the exchange and saw that they were trading the ones i have had and deposited the currency, in this case Super RARE in a quite expensive way too. But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange holds your data at ransom. You can only view your historic trading data for 4 months only. If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

overall_prompt_summary: User reviews reveal a mix of positive and negative feedback, highlighting several key themes. Positive reviews frequently commend the platform for its transaction growth, market expansion, and robust security features, indicating user satisfaction with these aspects. On the other hand, negative reviews often point out issues related to trading fairness, withdrawal difficulties, and regulatory concerns, suggesting areas where the platform may need improvement. Commonly mentioned aspects include transaction speed, user interface, customer support, security features, trading fees, and market liquidity, reflecting the diverse user priorities and experiences. To enhance user satisfaction, the platform should focus on addressing withdrawal difficulties, ensuring fair trading practices, and maintaining compliance with regulatory standards.
