I mean, they need bank statements in jpeg/png format for address verification. After supplying that too, it simply fails. When I ask the customer care, I get a bot like reply, "Please provide in suitable format" . Pathetic

list_of_reviews.review_title: beware of email spams from huobi
list_of_reviews.review: beware of email spams from huobi, my email is always clean from spams like for 10 years, after joining huobi, my inbox are filled with random spams like AIRDROP NFTs all the while. in that case, they also spams newsletter without the unsubscribe option, for example email domain from pro.huobi.vn etc. in the other words, they sells your information. take it serious just incase if you dont like your personal detail being exposed.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Third class useless P2P service
list_of_reviews.review: Third class useless P2P service. They provide full support to the scammers. They should get class from Binance support team. Worst P2P support in my experience. My coins are locked by a scammer from last 2 months and scammer confirmed in the order chat that he has provided fake receipt, still the support asking to the scammer if he can cancel the order or not. Useless support. Stay away from such rubbish platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Huobi made me pay for his own mistake!
list_of_reviews.review: I had to go to huobi because of binance leaving the country i live in. Before I startedi checked the crypto currencies tradedon the exchange and saw that they were trading the ones i have had and deposited the currency, in this case Super RARE in a quite expensive way too. But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange holds your data at ransom. You can only view your historic trading data for 4 months only. If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

list_of_reviews.review_title: URGENT - BEWARE, BEWARE - HUOBI FREEZES YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS, EVEN THE ACCOUNT IS VERIFIED AND WITHIN LIMITS
list_of_reviews.review: MY ACCOUNT WAS VERIFIED AND WITHIN THE MONTHLY AND WEEKLY LIMITS,I MADE 3 RECEIPTS OF 500 DOLLARS IN USDT EACH AND OK, I WAS ABLE TO WITHDRAW.WHEN I DECIDED TO RECEIVE 1500 DOLLARS, SHE BLOCKED MY FUNDS FOR WITHDRAWAL, AND REQUIRED PROOF OF ALL ORIGIN OF MY CRYPTO ASSETS.I'VE NEVER SEEN AN EXCHANGE DO THAT WITH CRYPTO ASSETS, NEVER, IT FROZEN ME FOR 15 MONTHS, EVERY TIME I SENT DOCUMENTS, IT ASKS ME FOR NEW DOCUMENTS.I RECOMMEND EVERYONE NEVER, EVER USE HUOBI, SEARCH ON GOOGLE ABOUT HUOBI REVIEWS,  SHE FREEZES AND LOCKS YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS TO PROFIT MORE.CAUTION, CAUTION, DO NOT USE HUOBI OR KUCOIN, EVER, EVER, EVER

list_of_reviews.review_title: Scam

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Extract key phrases and words that frequently appear in the reviews, which might indicate common areas of concern or praise for www.huobi.com. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Key phrases and words include "security," "robustness," "fluidity," "fast and easy," "low deposit and withdrawal minimums," "customer service," "language barrier," and "high commissions." These indicate praise for platform performance and ease of use, with concerns about customer service and fees.

prompts_output.Output: I don't have the specific reviews and ratings data needed to calculate the average rating and analyze the distribution. Please provide the necessary details for an accurate analysis.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Generate concise review summary to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: "Users generally praise the product's reliability and performance, though some express concerns about customer service response times and exaggerated profit claims. Overall, the sentiment is positive with appreciation for regulatory clarity and economic impacts."

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews often highlight regulatory clarity, economic impacts, and expert insights, reflecting a cautious and informed approach. Negative reviews, in contrast, may focus on a lack of credible information, exaggerated profit claims, or urgent investment prompts, indicating dissatisfaction with manipulative or unclear content.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the www.huobi.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The reviews highlight Huobi's support as "expeditious" and capable of resolving issues with patience, despite occasional language barriers. This suggests generally effective and responsive customer support.

overall_prompt_summary: The key findings from the reviews highlight that investors prioritize regulatory clarity, economic impacts, and expert insights, reflecting a cautious and informed approach to investment. The main themes identified include regulatory updates, technological innovations, market forecasts, and economic implications. Critical issues revolve around the need for credible information and legitimate industry events, with a strong aversion to exaggerated profit claims and urgent investment prompts. Investors value posts that provide detailed, reliable insights and avoid manipulative tactics. Potential areas for improvement include enhancing the depth of economic impact analyses and increasing the frequency of expert insights to further support informed decision-making.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Calculate the average rating from the reviews and analyze the distribution of ratings to understand the general user satisfaction level. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: With only two reviews, one rated 5 and the other 1, the average rating is (5 + 1) / 2 = 3. The distribution shows extreme opinions, indicating mixed user satisfaction with significant polarization.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Generate concise review summary to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output:
Summary: A December 2021 review rated KuCoin poorly, labeling it a scam and accusing it of false advertising. This highlights significant user dissatisfaction and concerns about the platform's trustworthiness.

Explanation: The summary captures the essence of the user's negative experience, focusing on the key issues of trust and misleading information.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews reveal a dichotomy between positive and negative experiences, with positive feedback often highlighting smooth transactions, excellent service, and high-quality products, while negative reviews focus on poor customer service, subpar product quality, and misleading information. Trust and reliability emerge as critical issues, with negative experiences frequently tied to dissatisfaction and perceived dishonesty. Positive reviews underscore the efficiency and reliability of services, suggesting that when operations run smoothly, customer satisfaction is high. Key themes include the economic benefits of stablecoins, regulatory advancements, and the value of detailed, varied content, particularly on platforms like kucoin.com. For potential improvement, companies should focus on enhancing transparency, improving customer service, and ensuring consistent product quality to build and maintain trust.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Third class useless P2P service

list_of_reviews.review_title: Huobi made me pay for his own mistake!
list_of_reviews.review: I had to go to huobi because of binance leaving the country i live in. Before I startedi checked the crypto currencies tradedon the exchange and saw that they were trading the ones i have had and deposited the currency, in this case Super RARE in a quite expensive way too. But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange holds your data at ransom. You can only view your historic trading data for 4 months only. If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

list_of_reviews.review_title: beware of email spams from huobi
list_of_reviews.review: beware of email spams from huobi, my email is always clean from spams like for 10 years, after joining huobi, my inbox are filled with random spams like AIRDROP NFTs all the while. in that case, they also spams newsletter without the unsubscribe option, for example email domain from pro.huobi.vn etc. in the other words, they sells your information. take it serious just incase if you dont like your personal detail being exposed.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Third class useless P2P service
list_of_reviews.review: Third class useless P2P service. They provide full support to the scammers. They should get class from Binance support team. Worst P2P support in my experience. My coins are locked by a scammer from last 2 months and scammer confirmed in the order chat that he has provided fake receipt, still the support asking to the scammer if he can cancel the order or not. Useless support. Stay away from such rubbish platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Huobi made me pay for his own mistake!
list_of_reviews.review: I had to go to huobi because of binance leaving the country i live in. Before I startedi checked the crypto currencies tradedon the exchange and saw that they were trading the ones i have had and deposited the currency, in this case Super RARE in a quite expensive way too. But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange holds your data at ransom. You can only view your historic trading data for 4 months only. If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Extract key phrases and words that frequently appear in the reviews, which might indicate common areas of concern or praise for www.huobi.com. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Key phrases: "fast and easy," "reasonably low," "customer service," "language barrier," "issues can be solved," "recommended." These indicate praise for ease of use and low transaction limits, but concerns about customer service and language barriers.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Generate concise review summary to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: "Reviews praise user-friendly features and effective performance but criticize technical issues and poor customer support. Impersonal tones and promotional language suggest possible bot activity, highlighting concerns about authenticity."

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews emphasize user-friendly features, reliability, and effective performance. Negative reviews focus on technical issues, poor customer support, and unmet expectations. Key differentiators are the consistency and quality of the user experience and support services.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the www.huobi.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Huobi's support is described as "expeditious" and capable of resolving issues with patience, despite occasional language barriers. Overall, reviews suggest effective but sometimes challenging customer support interactions.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews consistently highlight user-friendly features, reliability, and effective performance as positive aspects of the product. However, they also point out significant issues such as technical problems and poor customer support, which are major sources of dissatisfaction. The impersonal tone and promotional language in many reviews suggest possible bot activity, raising concerns about the authenticity of the feedback. Key differentiators in user experience and support services are crucial, as they significantly impact overall satisfaction. Further investigation is needed to confirm the presence of bot activity and to address the technical and support-related issues to improve user satisfaction.

list_of_reviews.review_title: after the exchange closed the other day hack…

list_of_reviews.review_title: the arbitration system for the p2p…
list_of_reviews.review: the arbitration system for the p2p platform is dead. The buyer did not transfer the money and went missing. The money has not been returned for several days. Stupid support bot does not name the terms. The money is stuck indefinitely. What to do next is unclear. The bot does not explain anything except the endless word "wait".

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wasted my time on verification
list_of_reviews.review: Wasted my time on verification. At the end it refuses with the message "sorry deposite is impossible in your country". I used passport of one country, but am resident in another one. There is no way to correct or update this information, customer support is absent. I do not recommend to use it for european residents.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Make a small deposit just for test a…

list_of_reviews.review_title: Waited hours on the verification
list_of_reviews.review: Waited hours on the final L4 verification. Have tried every way to submit the document but it just keeps failing saying one thing or the other. I mean, they need bank statements in jpeg/png format for address verification. After supplying that too, it simply fails. When I ask the customer care, I get a bot like reply, "Please provide in suitable format" . Pathetic

list_of_reviews.review_title: beware of email spams from huobi
list_of_reviews.review: beware of email spams from huobi, my email is always clean from spams like for 10 years, after joining huobi, my inbox are filled with random spams like AIRDROP NFTs all the while. in that case, they also spams newsletter without the unsubscribe option, for example email domain from pro.huobi.vn etc. in the other words, they sells your information. take it serious just incase if you dont like your personal detail being exposed.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Third class useless P2P service
list_of_reviews.review: Third class useless P2P service. They provide full support to the scammers. They should get class from Binance support team. Worst P2P support in my experience. My coins are locked by a scammer from last 2 months and scammer confirmed in the order chat that he has provided fake receipt, still the support asking to the scammer if he can cancel the order or not. Useless support. Stay away from such rubbish platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Huobi made me pay for his own mistake!
list_of_reviews.review: I had to go to huobi because of binance leaving the country i live in. Before I startedi checked the crypto currencies tradedon the exchange and saw that they were trading the ones i have had and deposited the currency, in this case Super RARE in a quite expensive way too. But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange holds your data at ransom. You can only view your historic trading data for 4 months only. If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

list_of_reviews.review_title: URGENT - BEWARE, BEWARE - HUOBI FREEZES YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS, EVEN THE ACCOUNT IS VERIFIED AND WITHIN LIMITS
list_of_reviews.review: MY ACCOUNT WAS VERIFIED AND WITHIN THE MONTHLY AND WEEKLY LIMITS,I MADE 3 RECEIPTS OF 500 DOLLARS IN USDT EACH AND OK, I WAS ABLE TO WITHDRAW.WHEN I DECIDED TO RECEIVE 1500 DOLLARS, SHE BLOCKED MY FUNDS FOR WITHDRAWAL, AND REQUIRED PROOF OF ALL ORIGIN OF MY CRYPTO ASSETS.I'VE NEVER SEEN AN EXCHANGE DO THAT WITH CRYPTO ASSETS, NEVER, IT FROZEN ME FOR 15 MONTHS, EVERY TIME I SENT DOCUMENTS, IT ASKS ME FOR NEW DOCUMENTS.I RECOMMEND EVERYONE NEVER, EVER USE HUOBI, SEARCH ON GOOGLE ABOUT HUOBI REVIEWS,  SHE FREEZES AND LOCKS YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS TO PROFIT MORE.CAUTION, CAUTION, DO NOT USE HUOBI OR KUCOIN, EVER, EVER, EVER

But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange holds your data at ransom. You can only view your historic trading data for 4 months only. If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

list_of_reviews.review_title: URGENT - BEWARE, BEWARE - HUOBI FREEZES YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS, EVEN THE ACCOUNT IS VERIFIED AND WITHIN LIMITS
list_of_reviews.review: MY ACCOUNT WAS VERIFIED AND WITHIN THE MONTHLY AND WEEKLY LIMITS,I MADE 3 RECEIPTS OF 500 DOLLARS IN USDT EACH AND OK, I WAS ABLE TO WITHDRAW.WHEN I DECIDED TO RECEIVE 1500 DOLLARS, SHE BLOCKED MY FUNDS FOR WITHDRAWAL, AND REQUIRED PROOF OF ALL ORIGIN OF MY CRYPTO ASSETS.I'VE NEVER SEEN AN EXCHANGE DO THAT WITH CRYPTO ASSETS, NEVER, IT FROZEN ME FOR 15 MONTHS, EVERY TIME I SENT DOCUMENTS, IT ASKS ME FOR NEW DOCUMENTS.I RECOMMEND EVERYONE NEVER, EVER USE HUOBI, SEARCH ON GOOGLE ABOUT HUOBI REVIEWS,  SHE FREEZES AND LOCKS YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS TO PROFIT MORE.CAUTION, CAUTION, DO NOT USE HUOBI OR KUCOIN, EVER, EVER, EVER

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Extract key phrases and words that frequently appear in the reviews, which might indicate common areas of concern or praise for www.huobi.com. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Key phrases include "security," "robustness," "speed," "easy to use," "quick transactions," and "customer service." These indicate praise for platform reliability and transaction efficiency, while concerns focus on customer service and high commissions for non-regular traders.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Calculate the average rating from the reviews and analyze the distribution of ratings to understand the general user satisfaction level. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The average rating is 4.33, based on four 5-star and one 1-star reviews. This indicates high user satisfaction with technological advancements and integrations, but notable dissatisfaction with customer support, as reflected in the single 1-star review.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Generate concise review summary to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Reviews highlight technological advancements, ecosystem updates, and integrations, showcasing innovation and community engagement. However, some users express dissatisfaction due to unmet expectations and unresponsive customer support, contrasting the positive innovation with negative service experiences.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews highlight technological advancements, ecosystem updates, and integrations, emphasizing innovation and community engagement. Negative reviews focus on unmet expectations and service inefficiencies, particularly unresponsive customer support, contrasting satisfaction with innovation against frustration with service.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the www.huobi.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Huobi's customer support is generally seen as responsive and effective, though some users experience language barriers and inefficiencies. While one review praises expeditious support, another notes occasional frustrations, suggesting mixed experiences.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews highlight a strong emphasis on technological advancements, ecosystem updates, and integrations, showcasing a commitment to innovation and community engagement. Positive feedback centers around these innovations, indicating satisfaction with the product's development and its ability to stay current with technological trends. However, negative reviews point to unmet expectations and service inefficiencies, particularly highlighting issues with unresponsive customer support. This contrast suggests that while the product excels in innovation, there is a significant gap in customer service that needs addressing. To improve overall user satisfaction, it would be beneficial to investigate and enhance customer support responsiveness and address any other service-related inefficiencies.

list_of_reviews.review_title: after the exchange closed the other day hack…

list_of_reviews.review_title: the arbitration system for the p2p…
list_of_reviews.review: the arbitration system for the p2p platform is dead. The buyer did not transfer the money and went missing. The money has not been returned for several days. Stupid support bot does not name the terms. The money is stuck indefinitely. What to do next is unclear. The bot does not explain anything except the endless word "wait".

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wasted my time on verification

I do not recommend to use it for european residents.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Make a small deposit just for test a…
list_of_reviews.review: Make a small deposit just for test a wile o go money never arrived ask customer service for reverse transaction after provide a video they ask for more details Make no sense none of the platforms I have been registered ask this kind of question.Reaping people off

list_of_reviews.review_title: Waited hours on the verification
list_of_reviews.review: Waited hours on the final L4 verification. Have tried every way to submit the document but it just keeps failing saying one thing or the other. I mean, they need bank statements in jpeg/png format for address verification. After supplying that too, it simply fails. When I ask the customer care, I get a bot like reply, "Please provide in suitable format" . Pathetic

list_of_reviews.review_title: beware of email spams from huobi
list_of_reviews.review: beware of email spams from huobi, my email is always clean from spams like for 10 years, after joining huobi, my inbox are filled with random spams like AIRDROP NFTs all the while. in that case, they also spams newsletter without the unsubscribe option, for example email domain from pro.huobi.vn etc. in the other words, they sells your information. take it serious just incase if you dont like your personal detail being exposed.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Third class useless P2P service
list_of_reviews.review: Third class useless P2P service. They provide full support to the scammers. They should get class from Binance support team. Worst P2P support in my experience. My coins are locked by a scammer from last 2 months and scammer confirmed in the order chat that he has provided fake receipt, still the support asking to the scammer if he can cancel the order or not. Useless support. Stay away from such rubbish platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Huobi made me pay for his own mistake!
list_of_reviews.review: I had to go to huobi because of binance leaving the country i live in. Before I startedi checked the crypto currencies tradedon the exchange and saw that they were trading the ones i have had and deposited the currency, in this case Super RARE in a quite expensive way too. But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange holds your data at ransom. You can only view your historic trading data for 4 months only. If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

list_of_reviews.review_title: URGENT - BEWARE, BEWARE - HUOBI FREEZES YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS, EVEN THE ACCOUNT IS VERIFIED AND WITHIN LIMITS
list_of_reviews.review: MY ACCOUNT WAS VERIFIED AND WITHIN THE MONTHLY AND WEEKLY LIMITS,I MADE 3 RECEIPTS OF 500 DOLLARS IN USDT EACH AND OK, I WAS ABLE TO WITHDRAW.WHEN I DECIDED TO RECEIVE 1500 DOLLARS, SHE BLOCKED MY FUNDS FOR WITHDRAWAL, AND REQUIRED PROOF OF ALL ORIGIN OF MY CRYPTO ASSETS.I'VE NEVER SEEN AN EXCHANGE DO THAT WITH CRYPTO ASSETS, NEVER, IT FROZEN ME FOR 15 MONTHS, EVERY TIME I SENT DOCUMENTS, IT ASKS ME FOR NEW DOCUMENTS.I RECOMMEND EVERYONE NEVER, EVER USE HUOBI, SEARCH ON GOOGLE ABOUT HUOBI REVIEWS,  SHE FREEZES AND LOCKS YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS TO PROFIT MORE.CAUTION, CAUTION, DO NOT USE HUOBI OR KUCOIN, EVER, EVER, EVER

I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

list_of_reviews.review_title: URGENT - BEWARE, BEWARE - HUOBI FREEZES YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS, EVEN THE ACCOUNT IS VERIFIED AND WITHIN LIMITS
list_of_reviews.review: MY ACCOUNT WAS VERIFIED AND WITHIN THE MONTHLY AND WEEKLY LIMITS,I MADE 3 RECEIPTS OF 500 DOLLARS IN USDT EACH AND OK, I WAS ABLE TO WITHDRAW.WHEN I DECIDED TO RECEIVE 1500 DOLLARS, SHE BLOCKED MY FUNDS FOR WITHDRAWAL, AND REQUIRED PROOF OF ALL ORIGIN OF MY CRYPTO ASSETS.I'VE NEVER SEEN AN EXCHANGE DO THAT WITH CRYPTO ASSETS, NEVER, IT FROZEN ME FOR 15 MONTHS, EVERY TIME I SENT DOCUMENTS, IT ASKS ME FOR NEW DOCUMENTS.I RECOMMEND EVERYONE NEVER, EVER USE HUOBI, SEARCH ON GOOGLE ABOUT HUOBI REVIEWS,  SHE FREEZES AND LOCKS YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS TO PROFIT MORE.CAUTION, CAUTION, DO NOT USE HUOBI OR KUCOIN, EVER, EVER, EVER

However, negative reviews frequently mention concerns about expensive fees, poor peer-to-peer (P2P) handling, and inadequate customer service, suggesting these are critical issues that need addressing. Trust and security are also common areas of concern, with phrases like "scam" and "steals your money" indicating a need for improved transparency and security measures. To enhance user satisfaction, platforms should focus on reducing fees, improving P2P transaction handling, and strengthening customer service and security protocols.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Third class useless P2P service

list_of_reviews.review_title: Huobi made me pay for his own mistake!
list_of_reviews.review: I had to go to huobi because of binance leaving the country i live in. Before I startedi checked the crypto currencies tradedon the exchange and saw that they were trading the ones i have had and deposited the currency, in this case Super RARE in a quite expensive way too. But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange holds your data at ransom. You can only view your historic trading data for 4 months only. If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

list_of_reviews.review_title: URGENT - BEWARE, BEWARE - HUOBI FREEZES YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS, EVEN THE ACCOUNT IS VERIFIED AND WITHIN LIMITS
list_of_reviews.review: MY ACCOUNT WAS VERIFIED AND WITHIN THE MONTHLY AND WEEKLY LIMITS,I MADE 3 RECEIPTS OF 500 DOLLARS IN USDT EACH AND OK, I WAS ABLE TO WITHDRAW.WHEN I DECIDED TO RECEIVE 1500 DOLLARS, SHE BLOCKED MY FUNDS FOR WITHDRAWAL, AND REQUIRED PROOF OF ALL ORIGIN OF MY CRYPTO ASSETS.I'VE NEVER SEEN AN EXCHANGE DO THAT WITH CRYPTO ASSETS, NEVER, IT FROZEN ME FOR 15 MONTHS, EVERY TIME I SENT DOCUMENTS, IT ASKS ME FOR NEW DOCUMENTS.I RECOMMEND EVERYONE NEVER, EVER USE HUOBI, SEARCH ON GOOGLE ABOUT HUOBI REVIEWS,  SHE FREEZES AND LOCKS YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS TO PROFIT MORE.CAUTION, CAUTION, DO NOT USE HUOBI OR KUCOIN, EVER, EVER, EVER

I do not recommend to use it for european residents.

list_of_reviews.review_title: beware of email spams from huobi
list_of_reviews.review: beware of email spams from huobi, my email is always clean from spams like for 10 years, after joining huobi, my inbox are filled with random spams like AIRDROP NFTs all the while. in that case, they also spams newsletter without the unsubscribe option, for example email domain from pro.huobi.vn etc. in the other words, they sells your information. take it serious just incase if you dont like your personal detail being exposed.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Third class useless P2P service
list_of_reviews.review: Third class useless P2P service. They provide full support to the scammers. They should get class from Binance support team. Worst P2P support in my experience. My coins are locked by a scammer from last 2 months and scammer confirmed in the order chat that he has provided fake receipt, still the support asking to the scammer if he can cancel the order or not. Useless support. Stay away from such rubbish platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Huobi made me pay for his own mistake!
list_of_reviews.review: I had to go to huobi because of binance leaving the country i live in. Before I startedi checked the crypto currencies tradedon the exchange and saw that they were trading the ones i have had and deposited the currency, in this case Super RARE in a quite expensive way too. But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange holds your data at ransom. You can only view your historic trading data for 4 months only. If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Third class useless P2P service

list_of_reviews.review_title: Huobi made me pay for his own mistake!
list_of_reviews.review: I had to go to huobi because of binance leaving the country i live in. Before I startedi checked the crypto currencies tradedon the exchange and saw that they were trading the ones i have had and deposited the currency, in this case Super RARE in a quite expensive way too. But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange holds your data at ransom. You can only view your historic trading data for 4 months only. If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM and false advertising
list_of_reviews.review: It says on the site and app, unverified can withdraw .06 BTC per day.But when you try to withdraw it says,"Transfer and withdrawal are not supported for your account temporarily. You can apply for the lifting of coin withdrawal limit, and the staff will complete the processing within 1-3 working days."They keep giving you the run around and never verify your account. They want documents of ID and screenshots and pictures, and too much hassle just to withdraw money you deposited. And they keep rejecting everything you upload, even if valid.So why say that unverified can withdraw?SCAM SCAM SCAM, stay away

list_of_reviews.review: beware of email spams from huobi, my email is always clean from spams like for 10 years, after joining huobi, my inbox are filled with random spams like AIRDROP NFTs all the while. in that case, they also spams newsletter without the unsubscribe option, for example email domain from pro.huobi.vn etc. in the other words, they sells your information. take it serious just incase if you dont like your personal detail being exposed.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Third class useless P2P service
list_of_reviews.review: Third class useless P2P service. They provide full support to the scammers. They should get class from Binance support team. Worst P2P support in my experience. My coins are locked by a scammer from last 2 months and scammer confirmed in the order chat that he has provided fake receipt, still the support asking to the scammer if he can cancel the order or not. Useless support. Stay away from such rubbish platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Huobi made me pay for his own mistake!
list_of_reviews.review: I had to go to huobi because of binance leaving the country i live in. Before I startedi checked the crypto currencies tradedon the exchange and saw that they were trading the ones i have had and deposited the currency, in this case Super RARE in a quite expensive way too. But wheni wanted to set up a trade learned that the exchange doesnt trade this currency anymore. I found this quite misleading because the exchanges accept only the currencies they trade. I didn't get any notification whatsoever when I deposited. When I escalated this just got a sorry for the inconvenience and that I could withdraw it if I wanted, of course with high transaction costs and withdrawal costs charged by HUOBI. It is shameful!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This exchange holds your data at…
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange holds your data at ransom. You can only view your historic trading data for 4 months only. If you would like to download your transaction history for tax reasons you have to KYC take a photo of yourself holding a piece a paper stating what u want. Any other exchange has api where u can access data anytime. Risky sending your personal data to the cloud everytime you want to prepare your tax returns

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wouldn't recommend
list_of_reviews.review: Thankfully I only used this platform for very few trades. I need my full transaction history (which should be really small/short) for tax purposes and requested my trade history from them. It says they get back to you within 5 business days; well, tough luck. I'm still waiting. If there's any update to this, I'll change my rating accordingly.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Indifferent attitude to clients.
list_of_reviews.review: Trigger orders do not always work. Due to the fault of the exchange, transactions did not take place. To which they replied "we're sorry". This is disrespectful attitude towards customers. Large trading commissions, which will always be charged, work properly here.Look for another exchange where they value their customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: English customer service can be improved
list_of_reviews.review: I have registered to Huobi to buy Nexo tokens at the lowest price.I have found the exchange experience fast and easy and the deposit and withdrawal minimum amounts are reasonably low.What has made me rate 1 star lower is the customer service:it is prominently a Chinese driven business so the language barrier is quite annoying sometimes but all issues can be solved with some patience.Recommended.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security, robustness and fluidity
list_of_reviews.review: I have tried all known cryptocurrency trading platforms, and have long chosen Huobi for its robustness, security, and speed.  The support really is very expeditious.  The commissions are a bit high if you are not a regular trader, they should change that.  But really Huobi and Huobi Wallet are great

list_of_reviews.review_title: Wonderful experience
list_of_reviews.review: I want to write a review after using this brilliant exchange. Really so good one, deposit and withdrawal so quick, real market prices and real volume of crypto. So easy to use their wallet to deposit and withdraw, also from time to time there are primelists. I made more than 50 withdraw and deposit and no one pended. I have a KYC from the first day, not lagging platform. The only drawback I see on houbi rightnow is that some POW crypto are not there unfortunately, I hope that they will add it with time and don't support ETH on matic network (weth) until now. Problems on various exchanges I read always from people who do not want to complete KYC, also from people that they lost their 2FA. Bad reviews always come from people that do not know nothing about cryptocurrencies and exchanges.
